RecipeDef.label: purchase gravlite panels
RecipeDef.description: Offer silver in exchange for 50 gravlite panels.\n\nThe price includes the cost of the materials you'd normally use to make them.

RecipeDef.label: purchase shuttle engine
RecipeDef.description: Offer silver in exchange for a shuttle engine.\n\nDue to the scarcity of this item, Nebula will only sell it to someone who can explain how it works.

RecipeDef.label: purchase sentience catalyst
RecipeDef.description: Offer silver in exchange for a sentience catalyst.\n\nDue to how easy this item is to acquire, Nebula insists on having a quick chat before she'll sell it to you.
